rules_text:
When Sola enters, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice a Treasure: You gain 3 life.
{2}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“Less-than-legal product is not beyond our reach. It'll just cost you a bit more.”[/i]
